name: Check if Admin able to upadte a program with program name starting with a number

steps.name: Given  Admin creates PUT Request with Program Name for the LMS API endpoint with valid request Body with mandatory , additional  fields.
When  Admin sends Put Request and Pgm Name starting with Number in request Body with endpoint
Then  Admin receives 400 Bad Request Status for put Pgm name starting with number
